**PARENT**: app/public/help-center-articles/hosts/

---

## DIRECTORY_INTENT

[PURPOSE]: Static HTML help articles about creating and managing listings
[PATTERN]: SEO-friendly pre-rendered HTML with shared CSS/JS
[AUDIENCE]: Hosts setting up or optimizing their property listings

---

## FILE_INVENTORY

### damage-deposit.html
[INTENT]: Guide to setting and managing damage deposits
[TOPICS]: Deposit amounts, when to charge, claim process, refund timeline, pros/cons

### multiple-properties.html
[INTENT]: Managing multiple property listings

### live-in-listing.html
[INTENT]: Information about live-in listing options

### public-information.html
[INTENT]: What information is publicly visible

### storage-area.html
[INTENT]: Storage requirements for listings

---

## TEMPLATE_PATTERN

All articles follow the standard help center HTML template:
- Split Lease main header with navigation
- Breadcrumb navigation (All Collections > For Hosts > Article)
- Article content with info boxes, tables, and structured headings
- Sidebar navigation linking to related listing articles
- Feedback section
- Shared CSS: `/help-center-articles/css/style.css`
- Shared JS: `/help-center-articles/js/split-lease-nav.js`
